hero.headline: Unleash Your Winning Team
hero.description: You built your company on sheer energy. Your energy doesn't scale forever. A working system does.

avatar1.title: The plateau after the hustle
avatar1.description: You hit €1-3M on energy, talent, and sheer willpower. Respect. But now you're noticing: more of the same doesn't mean more results. The strategies that got you here aren't the ones that'll take you further.

avatar2.title: The invisible price of growth
avatar2.description: Your LinkedIn says success. Your gut says: something's off. You make 47 decisions a day, hold everything together — and wonder at night if this is sustainable. Spoiler: It doesn't have to be.

avatar3.title: €10M+. But chaos grows with it.
avatar3.description: The numbers check out. But underneath? Too many fires, too little structure. Your best people feel it. So do you. There has to be a lever somewhere.

framework.headline: Two disciplines. One result.
framework.subheadline: 500+ founders and €50M+ in revenue taught us one thing: Revenue without leadership is a flash in the pan. Leadership without revenue is a hobby.

beliefs.headline: What the best founders do differently

belief1.title: Revenue is no accident
belief1.description: Predictable revenue doesn't come from luck. It comes from a system. And good systems can be built — step by step.

belief2.title: Hustle has an expiry date
belief2.description: Pure effort gets you to €5M. But beyond that? You need structures that work even without you. No burnout. No drama.

belief3.title: Leadership can be learned
belief3.description: Great leadership isn't a talent you either have or don't. It's a craft — like negotiating, like selling. And it can be trained.

belief4.title: You're in good company
belief4.description: Over 500 founders had the exact same doubts as you. None of them solved it alone. All of them solved it.

crisis.headline: The Invisible Crisis in B2B Sales
crisis.subheadline: Because without knowledge and skill, all the hustle in the world won't move the needle.

stat1.label: without professional training
stat1.description: Winning attention, leading conversations, persuading, making offers — all experimental freestyle.

stat2.label: don't feel ready
stat2.description: They don't feel adequately prepared for their role and the expectations that come with it.

stat3.label: want to rely on their team
stat3.description: This gap costs companies a significant share of their potential revenue and damages enterprise value.

rules.headline: The Rules Have Changed
rules.text: Today's buyers are better informed than ever. They research independently, compare vendors, and make decisions before a salesperson even enters the picture. Anyone still relying on classic pitches and product presentations will lose — not because the product is bad, but because access to the customer is missing.

stat1.label: prefer no sales contact
stat1.text: of B2B buyers prefer a buying experience without direct sales contact. Your sellers must deliver real value — or become irrelevant.

stat2.label: decide alone
stat2.text: of customers no longer speak with vendors before making their decision. Those not perceived as a sparring partner early enough arrive too late.

goodnews.highlight: revenue increases of 48% within the first 12 months are the norm.

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: The SalesMade Academy is designed for B2B sales teams looking to systematically improve their conversion rates and achieve predictable revenue. Ideal for companies with 5-50 sellers ready to invest in professional training.
faq.q2: How much time does my team need to invest?
faq.a2: The program runs for 12 months with 90 minutes of live training per month, 120 minutes of group coaching, and self-directed learning. The content is practical and directly applicable in day-to-day business.
faq.q3: What happens if we don't see results?
faq.a3: We offer a 100% money-back guarantee. If you don't see measurable improvements in your KPIs after 90 days, we refund the full investment. No questions asked.
faq.q4: Can we send individual team members?
faq.a4: Yes, that's possible. However, the best results come when the entire team trains together. This creates a unified sales language and methodology across the organization.
faq.q5: What makes the Academy different from traditional training?
faq.a5: 6-day classroom trainings are outdated — for very good reasons. The SalesMade Academy is a digital, AI-powered platform with personal sparring from experienced sales leaders. We meet each team member exactly where they are today and guide them step by step through the right development stages each month.

finalcta.headline: 45 Minutes for Your Next 36 Months.
finalcta.text: How convincing is your team compared to the competition? Our no-obligation benchmark can give you valuable insights. Your team goes through a realistic customer scenario where we observe and evaluate 13 critical sales skills. The right information inspires the best decisions.
finalcta.footnote: Only a few spots left for the soft launch.
